metadata.title: CVE-2021-39867 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 8.15, a DNS rebindingvulnerability in Gitea Importer may be exploited by an attacker to triggerServer Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
